item.title: About me
item.description: Hi everyone 👋 I am Paolo, Cybercsecurity Enthusiast 😄 Pronouns: He/Him 📍 Milan, Italy 🔭 I’m currently working as Defensive cybersecurity specialist for Horizon Consulting. Help client to defense their perimeter to attacker. 🌱 I’m currently learning Web security and Malware Analysis Leanguages 🇮🇹 🇺🇸: Italian (Native speaker), English (Fluent) 📫 How to reach me: paolo.filippini99@gmail.com Interests Web Security 🌍: I am trying to improve my skills in this area, reading articles,books and watch videos and open burp at least once a day 😄 Volunteering: I am currently volunteering in CNGEI Milan (Scouts).
